media:group.media:title: Encouraging Active Bilingualism (Language Development)
media:group.media:description: What are some methods for teaching a child to be bilingual? Why do children raised in bilingual households often grow up to be monolingual? How can parents provide incentives for children to speak a minority language? What is a superstratum language? What is a substratum language? Why would it matter whether a child is acquiring a majority or minority language as a second language?
